mapper.select: select id, name, name_old, ename, ename_old, pinyin, pinyin_old, gender, gender_old, home_type, home_type_old, politics, politics_old, nation, nation_old, profession, profession_old, birthday, birthday_old, native_place, native_old, certificate_type, certificate_type_old, certificate_no, certificate_no_old, phone, phone_old, mphone, mphone_old, address, address_old, post_code, post_code_old, email, email_old, audit_status, audit_operator, audit_date, operator, update_date, enabled_flag from stu_student_grade where id = #{value}
mapper.insert: insert into stu_student_grade ( id, name, name_old, ename, ename_old, pinyin, pinyin_old, gender, gender_old, home_type, home_type_old, politics, politics_old, nation, nation_old, profession, profession_old, birthday, birthday_old, native_place, native_old, certificate_type, certificate_type_old, certificate_no, certificate_no_old, phone, phone_old, mphone, mphone_old, address, address_old, post_code, post_code_old, email, email_old, audit_status, audit_operator, audit_date, operator, update_date ) values ( #{id}, #{name}, #{nameOld}, #{ename}, #{enameOld}, #{pinyin}, #{pinyinOld}, #{gender}, #{genderOld}, #{homeType}, #{homeTypeOld}, #{politics}, #{politicsOld}, #{nation}, #{nationOld}, #{profession}, #{professionOld}, #{birthday}, #{birthdayOld}, #{nativePlace}, #{nativeOld}, #{certificateType}, #{certificateTypeOld}, #{certificateNo}, #{certificateNoOld}, #{phone}, #{phoneOld}, #{mphone}, #{mphoneOld}, #{address}, #{addressOld}, #{postCode}, #{postCodeOld}, #{email}, #{emailOld}, #{auditStatus}, #{auditOperator}, #{auditDate}, #{operator}, now() )
mapper.update: update stu_student_grade set enabled_flag =0 where id = #{value}

update stu_student_grade set enabled_flag =0 where id in
#{id}
